title: Gold 1 Sup LF Plat + ADC main to duo botlane with
body: Title says it all, looking for a plat+ adc main to Duo both with for the remainder of this season as well as potentially next season depending on how synergy goes. I'm currently gold 1 and want plat by the end of this season easy. I play lots of ranged supports and am very agressive in lane so like someone that i know will go all in at the right times to follow up. Add me IGN / Msg me: Doctor Jekyll
